name: The Rope of HARMony
description:
The Rope of Harmony is a magical item that is both sword and shield. It binds your enemies movement to your own. And while it is connected neither party can be harmed in any way.  But once it is cut your foes become vulnerable, and so do you!
Fight your way through the dungeon with nothing but this rope and your surroundings, and find the treasure!

Controls:

Move- A and D or arrow keys

Jump- Space

Cut Rope- C
